select from users_front where (mobile = #{mobile} or username=#{username}) and company_id=#{companyId} limit 0,1
select from users_front where username = #{username} and company_id=#{companyId} limit 0,1

select uf.id, uf.username, uf.password, uf.mobile, st.email, uf.school_id as schoolId, uf.status, uf.company_id as companyId, uf.email_auth_sign as emailAuthSign, uf.email_auth_sendtime as emailAuthSendtime, uf.email_auth_code as emailAuthCode, uf.user_city as userCity, uf.uuid, uf.head_pic_min as headPicMin, uf.head_pic_mid as headPicMid, uf.head_pic_max as headPicMax, uf.regist_time as registTime, uf.interests, uf.vip_flag vipFlag, uf.regist_type as registType, uf.promote_source as promoteSource, uf.promote_keyword as promoteKeyword, uf.recharge as recharge, st.name, s.school_name as schoolName from users_front uf left join student st on uf.id=st.user_id left join sys_config_school s on uf.school_id=s.id where uf.company_id=#{companyId} and uf.school_id=#{schoolId} and date_format(uf.regist_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= '${startDate}' and date_format(uf.regist_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= '${endDate}' and uf.vip_flag = #{vipFlag} and uf.regist_type = #{registType} and TO_DAYS(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'))-TO_DAYS(DATE_FORMAT(uf.regist_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))<=#{timeLen} and TO_DAYS(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'))-TO_DAYS(DATE_FORMAT(uf.regist_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))=#{timeLen} limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

select uf.id, uf.username, uf.password, uf.mobile, uf.email, uf.school_id as schoolId, uf.status, uf.company_id as companyId, uf.email_auth_sign as emailAuthSign, uf.email_auth_sendtime as emailAuthSendtime, uf.email_auth_code as emailAuthCode, uf.user_city as userCity, uf.uuid, uf.head_pic_min as headPicMin, uf.head_pic_mid as headPicMid, uf.head_pic_max as headPicMax, uf.regist_time as registTime, uf.interests, uf.vip_flag vipFlag, uf.regist_type as registType, uf.promote_source as promoteSource, uf.promote_keyword as promoteKeyword, uf.member_id as memberId, uf.member_level as memberLevel, uf.member_buy_length as memberBuyLength, uf.member_end_time as memberEndTime, ur.recharge as recharge, st.name, s.school_name as schoolName from users_front uf left join student st on uf.id=st.user_id left join sys_config_school s on uf.school_id=s.id where uf.company_id=#{companyId} and uf.member_id is not NULL and uf.member_id <> '0' and TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(uf.regist_time)<=#{timeLen} limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

select u.id as userId,u.integral_remaining as integralRemaining,u.username,s.id as stuId,s.name as stuName,s.mobile as mobile from users_front u INNER JOIN student s on s.user_id=u.id where u.company_id=#{companyId} and s.delete_flag=0 and s.name like '%${stuName}%' and s.mobile like '%${mobile}%' and u.username like '%${username}%' limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

select count(u.id) from users_front u INNER JOIN student s on s.user_id=u.id where u.company_id=#{companyId} and s.delete_flag=0 and s.name like '%${stuName}%' and s.mobile like '%${mobile}%' and u.username like '%${username}%' limit 1
select * from users_front where member_id=#{memberId}
